title: Vista-Audio (Soundmax AD 1888 Drivers).rar
description:
if you are running Windows Vista,
And you have the soundmax AD1888 Chipset, 
you have no sound in vista, it was a fucking problem.

But for those people i have a working soundmax AD1888 Driver.

you find 2 maps in the file.

1 use the swsetup, there is a setup.exe in it, instal and reboot your pc.
  you should have sound now.
2 if it still doesn&#039;t work, update your driver using devicemaneger,
  with the other map (Vista-Driver-Vista)
3 it will work now 100%, i have helpt lots of people already and thee are very happy with this driver.
4 it depends witch vista you are running (x68 - 32bit) or (x64 - 64bit)

So finally sound on vista with soundmax AD 1888 Chipset on your pc.

please write a comment, and enjoy your sound.

marcelbnrd. :)
